service.title: Home Documents
service.documentation: The current draft for HTTP Home Documents provides a JSON syntax only. This draft provides an XML syntax for the same underlying data model, so that the concept of HTTP Home Documents can be consistently exposed in both JSON- and XML-based HTTP services.

document.title: Home Documents (XML)
document.documentation: The current draft for HTTP Home Documents provides a JSON syntax only. This draft provides an XML syntax for the same underlying data model, so that the concept of HTTP Home Documents can be consistently exposed in both JSON- and XML-based HTTP services.

vocabulary.title: The Home Document XML Vocabulary
vocabulary.documentation: The following XML Schema is describing the XML shown in Section 2. Since there currently is no extension model, the XML Schema does currently not contain any extension points.
